text: "How Much Is It Worth to Live in L.A." is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Waylon Jennings. It was released in September 1988 as the first single from the album Full Circle. The song reached #38 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Jennings and Roger Murrah. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1988) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:1988 singles Category:1988 songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Songs written by Waylon Jennings Category:Songs written by Roger Murrah Category:Song recordings produced by Jimmy Bowen Category:MCA Records singles
title: How Much Is It Worth to Live in L.A.
